exception.name: ErrorParameterTooLong
exception.description: This exception is thrown by any SE API method when at least one parameter passed to the method is too long.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorParameterTooLong that is thrown by any SE API method when at least one parameter passed to the method is too long.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when parameter exceeds maximum allowed length
specification.applicability: Common exception - applicable to all API functions with length-constrained parameters
